name: claudepro-directory
description: A community-driven directory of Claude configurations including agents, MCP servers, rules, commands, and hooks
author: JSONbored

scripts.deploy:edge: cd apps/edge && rm -rf supabase && mkdir -p supabase/functions && rsync -a --exclude 'node_modules' --exclude '.git' ../../packages supabase/ && cp -R functions/public-api supabase/functions/ && cp -R functions/flux-station supabase/functions/ && cp -R functions/mcp-directory supabase/functions/ && cp functions/config.toml supabase/functions/ && cp functions/deno.json supabase/functions/ && sed -i '' 's|\.\./\.\./\.\./packages|../packages|g' supabase/functions/deno.json && supabase functions deploy public-api --project-ref hgtjdifxfapoltfflowc --import-map supabase/functions/deno.json --no-verify-jwt && supabase functions deploy flux-station --project-ref hgtjdifxfapoltfflowc --import-map supabase/functions/deno.json --no-verify-jwt && supabase functions deploy mcp-directory --project-ref hgtjdifxfapoltfflowc --import-map supabase/functions/deno.json && rm -rf supabase
scripts.dev: turbo run generate:config generate:categories:exec generate:service-worker:exec --concurrency=4 && next dev apps/web --turbopack
scripts.build: turbo run generate:config generate:categories:exec generate:service-worker:exec --concurrency=4 && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.build:skills:exec: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-generate-skills
scripts.build:mcpb: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-generate-mcpb
scripts.verify:mcpb: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-verify-mcpb
scripts.generate:categories:exec: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-generate-categories
scripts.generate:service-worker:exec: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-generate-service-worker
scripts.generate:readme: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-generate-readme
scripts.sync:db: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-sync-db --skip-dump
scripts.sync:db:full: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-sync-db
scripts.sync:db:types: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-sync-db --only-types
scripts.backup:db: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-backup-db
scripts.cache:info: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-cache info
scripts.cache:clear: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-cache clear
scripts.webhooks:backlog: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-webhooks-list
scripts.webhooks:replay: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-webhooks-replay
scripts.changelog:generate: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-changelog
scripts.changelog:generate:dry: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-changelog --dry-run
scripts.changelog:generate:branch: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-changelog --branch
scripts.type-check:packages: tsc --noEmit -p packages/database-types/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/shared-runtime/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/web-runtime/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/generators/tsconfig.json
scripts.type-check:unused:filtered: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-lint-unused
scripts.verify:flags: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-verify-flags
scripts.verify:routes: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-verify-routes
scripts.email:upload: pnpm run generators:build && pnpm exec heyclaude-sync-email
scripts.prepare: command -v lefthook >/dev/null 2>&1 && lefthook install || echo 'Skipping lefthook install (not available)'
scripts.analyze:all: npm run analyze:unused && npm run analyze:circular
